name: obsidian-link-opener
title: Obsidian Link Opener
description: Open URLs from Obsidian markdown files' frontmatter
author: osteele

commands.name: index
commands.title: Open Link
commands.description: Open URLs from Obsidian notes' frontmatter

commands.name: select-vault
commands.title: Select Vault
commands.description: Choose which Obsidian vault to use

commands.name: refresh-index
commands.title: Refresh Index
commands.description: Clear cache and rebuild the index of Obsidian URLs

preferences.name: useFrecency
preferences.title: Use Frecency Sorting
preferences.label: Enable frecency-based sorting
preferences.description: Sort notes by frequency and recency of use. When disabled, sorts alphabetically.

preferences.name: cacheTTL
preferences.title: Cache TTL (minutes)
preferences.description: How long to cache vault data before refreshing (in minutes). Lower values mean more frequent updates but slower performance.
